SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CreditScreen
A scene2d window consisting of a title, a scrollable widget and an exit button.
DialogueBox
A class to display a dialogue box for text and options on the screen.
EventManager
A class that maps Object's event strings to actual Java functions.
GameObject
An object that stores a position and dimensions, but can also store extra properties when loaded from a tilemap.
GameOverScreen
A screen that displays the player's stats at the end of the game.
GameScreen
Handles the majority of the game logic, rendering and user inputs of the game.
HustleGame
A class that is initially created by DesktopLauncher, loads consistent files at the start of the game and initialises lots of important classes.
MenuScreen
A screen to display the game menu to the player has the buttons "Start", "Settings", "Credits, "Exit" ALso diaplays a tutorial window and an avatar select screen
OptionDialogue
Deprecated.
Creates a small window to recieve a yes/no response from the player No longer used, but the code may still be useful
Player
A class handling everything needed to control and draw a player, including animation, movement and collision
SettingsScreen
A screen to display settings to the player, lets the player adjust sound and music volume
SoundManager
A class handling loading, playing and disposing of sounds.
